name: helfi-hav
description: Search monitoring for HELfi projects with elastic-proxy.

scripts.test: npm run build:ts && tsc -p test/tsconfig.json && c8 node --test -r ts-node/register test/**/*.ts
scripts.start: npm run build:ts && npm run copy:assets && npm run hav:init-mongodb && fastify start -l info dist/app.js
scripts.dev: npm run copy:assets; npm run build:ts && npm run hav:init-mongodb && concurrently -k -p "[{name}]" -n "TypeScript,App" -c "yellow.bold,cyan.bold" "npm:watch:ts" "npm:dev:start"
scripts.dev:start: npm run copy:assets; fastify start --ignore-watch=.ts$ -w -l info -P dist/app.js
